sequence.speaker: FERRUM
sequence.text: Well, if it isn’t the bunny rabbit herself. How are you, Lucia?

sequence.speaker: FERRUM
sequence.text: Great to hear. How’s my order?

sequence.speaker: LUCIA
sequence.text: Fermenting. Give me another day or two, I’ll have it ready.

sequence.speaker: FERRUM
sequence.text: Sounds good. This the infamous brother?

sequence.speaker: LUCIA
sequence.text: Yes, this is Adel, my very non-famous brother.
